title: Advanced STEM Mathematics Course Based on Online Laboratory

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics (calculus, linear algebra) and understanding of experimental design methodologies
context.additional_context: For corporate R&D professionals, operated via real-time video conferencing in BYOD environments, with formative assessment-driven feedback.

learning_goals: Design and execute mathematical modeling experiments using an online laboratory interface
Perform mathematical analysis of physical systems (e.g., vibration, fluid) using virtual simulation tools
Interpret data and derive results collaboratively with peers using real-time collaboration tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
